column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: All inner loop traffic approaching Tates Creek Rd MUST exit onto Tates Creek Rd.
